entity.description: Grants access to all entity permissions

setColor.description: Allows the user to change the color of an entity

setSubMaterial.description: Allows the user to change the subMaterial of an entity

parent.description: Allows the user to set the parent of an entity

unparent.description: Allows the user to remove the parent of an entity

applyForce.description: Allows the user to apply force to an entity

setPos.description: Allows the user to set the position of an entity

setAngles.description: Allows the user to set the angles of an entity

setVelocity.description: Allows the user to set the velocity of an entity

setFrozen.description: Allows the user to (un)freeze an entity

setSolid.description: Allows the user to set the solidity of an entity

enableGravity.description: Allows the user to change whether an entity is affected by gravity
